comment.author: 52445996@N00
comment._content:
JANUARY 4,1011

I GREW UP ON THE SANT LUKES BLOCK,IN THE BROWNSTONE 491 HUDSON STREET.MY MOTHER WAS THE 6TH GRADE TEACHER,AT SAINT LUKES SCHOOL,
FOR SEVERAL YEARS.IF ANYONE HAS ANY PHOTOGRAPHS OF THE REST OF THIS HISTORIC BLOCK,I  WOULD VERY MUCH ENJOY SEEING THE.FOR YEARS IN THE 1970S AND 80S,THERE WAS A LOVELY GARDEN CALLED, "MS LEIGHTON'S GARDEN.
I HAVE MANY FOND MEMORIES OG YOUTH SPENT ON THIS MOST UNIQUE BLOCL.

  SINCERELY YOURS,

  ANDREW LAING
